name: Alarm Clock, LED Digital Clock, Small Wall Clock, Battery Operated, Adjustable 3-Level Led Brightness, Dim Night Mode, 12/24Hr, Cordless, Constantly 1.2'' Digits Display for Bedroom/Travel,Easy to Set
short_description: Alarm clock & battery operated clock - This basic clock is powered by 4 x AA alkaline batteries only (not included), which can keep Constantly Big 1.2'' LED digit time display for more than 12 months. Bright LED time display, 24hour light up 1.2" large led time numbers can let you check your time clearly from a distance or even in the dark. It is a simple clock. Easy to set - Intuitive and Clear Marked Button, Great alarm clocks for kids and the elderly, they can operate the clock, set time, alarm, dimmer and 12Hr/ 24Hr. When the alarm is beeping, simply touch the top big snooze to pause the alarm to get extra 7 minutes nap, press any button to stop alarm today, and it will still sound the next day. Press “AL ON/OFF” to cancel the alarms and the alarm icon on the top-right corner will disappear. Alarm clock for bedroom - There are 3 levels of brightness for your options (day time), high/middle/low. The clock will enter into Night-mode and dim automatically at 8:00pm~6:00am to protect your eyes at night and save energy. No blinding lights or any annoying sounds disturb your sleep, create an peaceful environment for sleep. Perfect alarm clock for bedroom, beside, nightstand, desk, shelf and table. Digital alarm clock - Alarm clock will continue for 90 seconds ensuring definitely waking up. The alarm bell will louder every 30 seconds. There is also a 7-minute snooze that can be continually pressed repeat 3 times. The time accuracy of this clock is less than +/-30s per month. Small wall clock & desk clock - 1 holes on the back for easy wall-mounting for a small wall clock. It is also table-top for a simple desk clock. Perfect gifts for kids, toddlers, teens, adult, seniors, elderly, boys or girls, friends or families, ideal for gifts alarm clock.

name: Digital Alarm Clock Battery Operated/Night Light/Indoor Temperature, Small Digital Alarm Clock for Bedrooms Beside Travel
short_description: 【Larger Numbers】The digital alarm clock measures 5 1/4 (L) * 2 (W) * 3 (H) inches, small and light. The small clock face is utilized HD LCD screen, can be read easily 【Alarm Clock Battery Operated】This alarm clock is powered by 3 xAAA batteries only (not included), which can keep Constantly Big 4.5'' LED digit time display for more than 6 months. Battery operated (no cords) allows it to be used anywhere you need a clock 【Smart Nightlight 】The digital alarm clock features a night light ，this alarm clock can not only be used as a night light to help parents take care of their children better and makes the room cozy, but also make it easier to check the time in the dark 【Extra Loud Alarm Clock】 This alarm clock has a gradually faster beep noise which continues for 90 seconds. Before the alarm stops itself, top snooze button can be continually pressed to get an extra 8-minute nap.It doesn’t matter how much of a heavy sleeper you are 【Regular Features】Includes snooze time (5 minutes), 12/24 hour time format, calendar, and Indoor Temperature(°C or °F), easy for kids, teens to use, basic bedroom bedside table desk gift alarm clock

name: REACHER Wood Grain Sunrise Alarm Clock and Sound Machine Nightlight, Digital Dimmable Clock for Bedroom, 26 Sleep Sounds, White Noise Machine for Baby, Adults, Wake Up Light Alarm Clock for Kids
short_description: 【Cut Jarring. Awaken Sunrise】Reacher sunrise alarm clock mimics the glow of natural light. Its sunrise simulation gently brightens your room from 1% to 100% over 5–60 minutes, easing you out of sleep like a soft morning breeze. Without harsh alarms — just a gentle wake up light that makes every morning feel calmer, brighter, and truly refreshing. 【Sleep Deeply with Soothing Sounds】26 gentle sleep sounds, like white noise, ocean waves, rain, wind - help block distractions, quiet your thoughts, and guide you into deep, restful sleep. A 5–180 min timer automatically turns off sound and night light, supporting a peaceful and personalized bedtime routine. 【0-100% Dimmable Clock & Night Light】With a full-range display dimmer, get your personal comfort clock brightness without disturbing your sleep at night. 8 different colors of the nightlight with adjustable brightness. Soft light for reading, no eye strain for kids and adults. 【Ease into Setup】Designed for simplicity, the clock features clearly labeled icons and a logical layout for easy one-handed use. Just a quick glance to get started. With a built-in battery, you’ll worry about losing your alarm, light, or sound settings—even if the power goes out. 【Stylish Wood Design for Decor】 You will love the aesthetic of this sunrise clock sound machine. Sleek, clean, and modern make it looks like a beautiful piece of wood furniture. Functionality and stylish appearance make it a perfect gift for your family, lovers, friends, and kids.

name: Sharp Digital Alarm Clock – Black Case with Red LEDs - Ascending Alarm Grows Increasing Louder, Gentle Wake Up Experience, Dual Alarm - Battery Back-up, Easy to Use with Simple Operation
short_description: EASY TO USE DIGITAL ALARM CLOCK WITH DUAL ALARM - This clock has been designed with absolute simplicity in mind and is very easy to operate. Perfect for adults, children, teens, seniors and the elderly. EASY TO SET DUAL ALARM - Set one alarm for weekdays and the other for weekend! ASCENDING ALARM VOLUME - The ascending alarm begins sound faintly and then grew increasingly louder for gently wake up without being awakened abruptly ALARM BATTERY BACK UP (requires 2x AA battery, sold separately) Sleep with confidence knowing that your alarm will continue to function even in the event of a power outage. The display will be lit after power is restored. EASY TO READ ILLUMINATED RED LED DIGITS - Easy to Read Red Numbers on the clock are very clear with extra bright quality, See from across the room or even without glasses in the middle of the night!

name: uscce Small Digital Clock for Bedroom: 6 Dimmable Brightness 4 Alarm Volume - Plug in Clock with Easy Operation for Bedside Desk
short_description: Small Digital Alarm Clock with Brightness Dimmer: Measuring 5.9*3.11*1.65 inches, this compact alarm clock fits perfectly on your bedside, desk, or nightstand. It features a large LED display with 5 adjustable brightness levels plus OFF, allowing you to customize the brightness for clear visibility or a dim setting for better sleep. Plug-In Clock with Batter Backup: Powered by an adapter, this electric clock includes a battery backup to save your settings during power outages. Simply insert 3 AAA batteries (not included) for memory backup, ensuring your routine stays uninterrupted. Note: Adapter is needed to keep the clock working. Batteries are for memory backup only. Adjustable Volume Alarm with Snooze: Offers 4 adjustable volume levels ranging from 60-90dB, perfect for both light and heavy sleepers, whether you need a loud wake-up or a gentler sound. Use the 9-minute snooze function to get a little extra rest before starting your day. Convenient USB Charging Port: Features a built-in USB port, perfect for charging your phone or other devices at night, ensuring your devices are ready when you wake up. Easy Alarm Clock with Manual DST: Simple Operation includes a 12/24-hour time format switch and manual DST adjustment for year-round accuracy, making it easy to set up for all ages, including seniors and kids. Ideal for Home Decor and Gift: The minimalist design retains the benefits of a digital alarm clock: easy to set, accurate, and reliable. Importantly, its compact size and space-saving, make it perfect for decorating your room as a desk clock. It’s also an ideal gift for families, seniors, kids or friends.

name: Emerson ER100401 Smartset 15Watt Ultra Fast Wireless Charging Dual Alarm Clock Radio with Bluetooth Speaker, USB Charger, Cyan LED Night Light and 1.4" Display
short_description: Effortless Charging Experience: Convenient Wireless Mobile Charger Atop the Clock – Just Drop and Charge. Enhanced Charging Convenience: Equipped with an Additional USB Port for Charging Mobiles, Tablets, and More. Seamless Connectivity with Bluetooth V5.1 Technology: Simplified Pairing for a Smooth Experience. Precision Timekeeping: Automatic Self-Adjustment to the Right Year, Month, Date, Day, and Time upon Plug-In and After Power Interruptions. Product Dimensions: 6.22” W x 2.95” D x 3.54” H
product_description: Wireless 15W Ultra Fast Charging. Bluetooth 5.0 Technology for Easy Pairing and High Speed Data Transfer up to 10M Range. USB Port for Mobile Phone Charging (2.1A 5V). Patented SmartSet Automatic Time Setting System. Automatically Sets Itself to the Correct Year, Month, Date, Day and Time as Soon as You Plug it In and After Every Power Interruption. Automatically recognizes DST. Dual Alarm & Week Indication & Choice of 3 Alarm Modes: Every Day, Weekdays Only, or Weekends Only. 2-Level Cyan Night LED. Easy-to-Read, 1.4” Cyan LED Clock Display. 3-Level Dimmer Control and 1 Auto Dimmer. Button Cell Battery (Included) Maintains Time & Alarm Settings. Displays Month/Date at the Touch of a Button. Wake to Radio or Buzzer Alarm . Programmable Sleep-to Music Timer. Snooze/Repeat Alarm & Crescendo Wakeup Control. Digital Volume Controls. AUX-IN Input .

name: Peakeep Large Display Digital Alarm Clock for Bedrooms, Date Day of Week Temp Desk Table Clocks for Living Room Office, Dimmable Plug in Electric Clock, 5 Volumes, Loud, Auto DST
short_description: 𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐦 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐨𝐨𝐦: [Peakeep] gathers all features you rely on a clock for your bedroom living room desk table and office, such as modern sleek design, large visible numbers, dimmers, super loud for heavy sleepers, calendar, USB port, and even a backup battery alarm in case of power outages. 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲: Peakeep digital clock provides valuable information of date, day of week, temperature at a glance. You can easily keep track of your schedule without reaching phone or calendar. The temperature display allows you to quickly assess the weather conditions before starting your day. 𝐋𝐨𝐮𝐝 𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐒𝐥𝐞𝐞𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬: 5 settings of volume control for the alarm enable the clock to be super loud for heavy sleepers or those who have trouble waking up. It also allows you to set the alarm to a lower volume to help protect your hearing while still waking you up. 9-min snooze can be helpful if you like to catch a few extra minutes of sleep in the morning. 𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐍𝐮𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬: 2-inch height of large numbers are friendly for seniors / elderly and people with poor eyesight. 5 different brightness settings ensure clock time is always visible in various lighting conditions: brighter and comfort in day or lower brightness at night for an improved sleep or completely off at night. 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐃𝐒𝐓：Imagine never having to manually adjust your clock for Daylight Saving Time again. With auto DST, your digital alarm clock seamlessly transitions between standard and Daylight Savings Time, ensuring you're always in sync with the official time change. 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐜 𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐮𝐩: With an applicable type C adapter (included), this digital LED clock is able to run smoothly and accurately. 4 AAA batteries (not provided) can backup and memorize clock settings and trigger the alarm, this way you won’t oversleep or worry about resetting the time when power outages. 𝐀𝐥𝐚𝐫𝐦 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐔𝐒𝐁 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭: 1 USB charger port on back can charge your phone while you sleep, ensuring you start your day prepared with fully charged phone, and also save valuable outlet space.

name: Digital Dual Alarm Clock for Bedroom, Easy to Set, 0-100% Dimmer, USB Charger, 5 Sounds Adjustable Volume, Weekday/Weekend Mode, Snooze, 12/24Hr, Battery Backup, Compact for Bedside(Blue)
short_description: EASY TO SETUP & 0-100% DIMMABLE DISPLAY - All buttons do one task and are clearly labeled makes setting the time or alarm extremely intuitive and straightforward. Large easy to read blue LED digits(1.6-inch tall) that can be easily viewed from a distance and the brightness can be easily adjusted from very bright to fully dark with the simple dimmer dial, which is nice for sleeping so you don't have a bright light in the room. 12 or 24 hour time display optional. CUSTOMIZABLE DUAL ALARM - Set two separate alarms to suit your different schedules and 7-5-2 alarm mode lets you set alarms for every day, weekdays or weekend. Wake up in the morning to one of the 5 built-in alarm tones (Beep, Birds Chirping, Buzzer, Soft Music, or Siren), which begins quietly and gradually becomes louder up to the level(30dB-110dB optional) you set, so you don’t get abruptly woken up. EASY SNOOZE & EASY TO TURN ON/OFF ALARMS - With its big and easy to reach Snooze button, you can get 9 minutes extra rest without fumbling around. And the two buttons to turn the alarms off are easy to reach from the front even when you are half-asleep. And with a large 4.9-inch display but compact size(5.3"x2.9"x1.95") makes it easy-to-read but space-saving, perfect for your bedroom, bedside, nightstand, desk, shelf, table or living room. USB PORT FOR CHARGING & BATTERY BACKUP - 1 USB port located at the back will charge your phone or other mobile device while you sleep. AC-powered, but you have the option to back it up with 3 AAA batteries (NOT included) in case of power outage. Not only time and settings are restored, but alarms are also supported (USB will not work). Please be noted that the clock may drain batteries quickly, so ONLY use as a backup but isn't viable for regular use. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE & GIFT IDEAS - All Odokee products offer a hassle-free 18-month warranty, easy return policy and friendly customer service. The stylish design makes it both functional and decorative, so it’s a great gift for kids, seniors, teens, boys, girls, friends or families.

name: Digital Projection Alarm Clocks for Bedrooms - Large LED Display, 180° Rotatable Projector, 5-Level Dimmer,USB Charger,Battery Backup,Loud Dual Alarms for Kids Elderly,Heavy Sleepers,Snooze,12/24H,DST
short_description: Plastic Imported 🥰180° 𝗥𝗢𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗦𝗪𝗜𝗩𝗘𝗟 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗢𝗥✨--Designed with 180° rotatable swivel projector and projects ultra-clear time onto wall or ceiling within the optimum projection distance 1.6-9.8ft, allowing you easily read it even lying on the bed. For more clarity of projection image, you can rotate focus ring🔄 of the ceiling clock by proper angle. Press Projection Mode button to flip the orientation of upside down projection images so the numbers are always right-side-up. 🆕𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗥𝗔 𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗥 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝟱-𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗟 𝗔𝗗𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗕𝗥𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗧𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗗𝗜𝗠𝗠𝗘𝗥--The projection part has a dimmer switch with 5 levels, which can be adjusted to your preference. This is helpful for people who are sensitive to light at night and want to reduce the brightness of the bright projection shines on the ceiling. ⏰ 𝗗𝗨𝗔𝗟 𝗔𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗠𝗦 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗩𝗘𝗡𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗕𝗜𝗚 𝗦𝗡𝗢𝗢𝗭𝗘 𝗕𝗨𝗧𝗧𝗢𝗡--The projection clock can be set two separate alarms for couples with different routines or a backup for waking up heavy sleepers. The snooze button 💤 is in a convenient central location to turn off alarm to get extra 9 mins sleep before alerting you again. 🔊𝗔𝗗𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗔𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗠 𝗩𝗢𝗟𝗨𝗠𝗘--The alarm volume of this loud alarm clock can be adjusted to your preference by pressing "V+" or "V-" buttons, with levels ranging from 1-5. The incremental increase in volume ensures that the alarm sound gradually gets louder, making it less jarring to wake up to. 🔆𝟳" 𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗚𝗘 𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗘𝗥-𝗖𝗟𝗘𝗔𝗥 𝗧𝗜𝗠𝗘 𝗗𝗜𝗦𝗣𝗟𝗔𝗬 𝗔𝗟𝗔𝗥𝗠 𝗖𝗟𝗢𝗖𝗞 𝗪𝗜𝗧𝗛 𝟱-𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗟 𝗗𝗜𝗠𝗠𝗘𝗥--7" ultra-large display of the ceiling projection alarm clock enables you to easily view the time even across the room even with glasses👓 off and perfectly for elders. You can dim the display if you are sensitive to light at night by repeatedly pressing "DIMMER" switch with 5 levels, which is also good for protect your eyes.

name: Sharp Digital Alarm Clock – Tactile Plastic Case with Soft Rubberized Finish - Battery Operated – Blue Backlight on Demand – Ascending Alarm – Easy to Use – Charcoal Black
short_description: The Sharp (SPC483CAMZ) has a tactile rubberized charcoal black finish case with a unique feel and Easy-to-Use Top Button Controls for easy operation and setting of the clock. Features a large 1” LCD Display, making it easy to see across the room. The clock is battery operated, so you can take it anywhere! On Demand Blue Backlight - The clock features a built-in blue backlight to illuminate the screen when snooze/light button is pressed. You can easily illuminate the display with its blue backlight by pressing the snooze button. The display will light up for 5 seconds and turn off to extend your battery life. This alarm clock has an ascending alarm. Before the alarm stops itself, top mounted snooze button can be pressed for 5 extra minutes of sleep time. The Sharp (SPC483) digital alarm clock measures 4” (L) * 1.7” (W) * 2.3” (H) inches, small and light. It is an easy cordless battery operated alarm clock, powered by 2 - AAA batteries (not included), features an easy to read clear display, easy for kids, teens to use, basic bedroom bedside table desk gift alarm clock. Easy to Use Anywhere you Need a Clock – Easy set top button controls for simple operation. Battery operated (no cords) allows it to be used anywhere you need a clock!
